subject: RE: [junit] TestResult - Not Serializable
msgSnippet: TestResult is not serializable because it hasn t come up before. We would welcome a contribution to make it so. Regards, Kent Beck Three Rivers Institute _____
messageBody:
TestResult is not serializable because it hasn't come up before. We would
welcome a contribution to make it so.

Regards,

Kent Beck
Three Rivers Institute

_____

From: junit@yahoogroups.com [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of
rjgt04
Sent: Thursday, November 15, 2007 7:59 AM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] TestResult - Not Serializable



Hi,

I wanted to know why the class TestResult is not seriliazble, and if
is there is no reason if it would be ok for me to do a contribution.

Thanks
